House Bill/Resolution NO. HB05608
FULL TITLE : AN ACT CREATING AN ADVANCED STUDIES DEVELOPMENT PROGRAM FOR EXCEPTIONAL EMPLOYEES FROM THE GOVERNMENT AND THE PRIVATE SECTOR AND FOR OTHER PURPOSES
SHORT TITLE : “ Pensionado Act Of 2017 ”
ABSTRACT : Seeks to reverse human capital flight or “brain drain” by establishing fellowship program for qualified Filipino professionals from the public and private sectors and for those who are self-employed; Intends to help Filipino professionals obtain high-quality credentials, new skills, and expanded professional networks which will lead to the development of the country’s workforce as the returning scholars are expected to exert a broader influence by applying their knowledge and networks that they developed overseas.
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : VARGAS, ALFRED D.
DATE FILED : 2017-05-10
SIGNIFICANCE: NATIONAL
